name: Indian Mutiny: Little Sepoy
description:
Indian Mutiny: Little Sepoy is a challenging arcade game that brings you back in the 19th century. Take part in the Sepoy Mutiny – the uprising in India between 1857-58 against the violent rule of the British East India Company.
You play as a brave rebel boy. On your way to freedom you'll have to face the merciless British army. How can a mere rebel confront this power? With a bit of luck and a couple of tricks it'll be possible! Use your ability to measure by eye and shoot the enemies with ricocheting stones. Clear the area and go unharmed to stay alive and lead the rebels to victory!
CHECK YOUR EYEJudge the path of the stones to shoot down the enemiesCHALLENGE THE ENEMYLet's see if you can escape unscathed and hurl tyranny down from its throne. 30 challenging levels are already waiting for you!RECONSTRUCT THE PASTThe game is based on real historical events
